question: Which city hosted the final match of the Premier Badminton League title of 2019?
explanation: Bengaluru hosted the final match of the Premier Badminton League title of 2019. On 13th January 2019, the Bengaluru Raptors defeated Mumbai Rockets by 4-3 in the final of the Premier Badminton League title 2019 at the Kanteerava Indoor Stadium in Bengaluru to win their maiden title.
